title: Rhys James • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #56
itunes:title: Rhys James • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #56
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with Mock The Week-er and all round comedy treasure RHYS JAMES!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he and his guest go deep into the subject of mortality via cinema, and this week he is joined by Mock The Week-er and all round comedy treasure RHYS JAMES!


…or is it Rhys Jones? ALL SHALL BE REVEALED. A great one this week as Brett and Rhys get into all things existential and not so much, including his many Mock The Week appearances (and the amount of weeks that have not been mocked by him), meercat vibes, his crying ability and how he is not as adept with horror, how he relates to films about childhood and specific characters within, a brief parental split and hangovers. Oh, and so much more! Just don’t let the face, voice or attitude fool you - he did NOT go to private school. ENJOY!


EPISODE LINKS:

• RHYS on THE INTERNET!

• RHYS on TWITTER!

• RHYS on INSTAGRAM!

• RHYS's STANDUP SHOW 'SNITCH'!


• FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH LIVE @ BFI SOUTH BANK, THURSDAY 15th AUGUST!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT on PATREON!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
